bio: Syed Sadat Reza is a renowned chef, cookbook author, and restaurateur who has been instrumental in popularizing bengali cuisine globally. He is the co-founder of Djb, a Michelin-starred restaurant in New York City.

Siddique Ansari is a famous chef, food blogger, and restaurateur who has been instrumental in popularizing bengali cuisine globally. He is the co-founder of Djb, a Michelin-starred restaurant in Canada.
